data.name: Grass Cutters Academy - 25,000 Upgrade Points
data.detailed_description:
Gardening is a tough job, it takes time to upgrade your equipment and your tools, this DLC will give you a head start with an injection of upgrade points

Provides the following benefits:

★ 25,000 Upgrade Points

*Upgrade Points can be gathered ingame by cutting grass
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Gardening is a tough job, it takes time to upgrade your equipment and your tools, this DLC will give you a head start with an injection of upgrade points Provides the following benefits: ★ 25,000 Upgrade Points *Upgrade Points can be gathered ingame by cutting grass

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 and Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB Graphics
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
